name: Windy Gun
description:
Windy Gun

You play as a former lab worker exploring their former place of work from 20 years in the past. The purpose is to explore the purpose of the lab, the secret purpose. 

You would need to pick up the titular Wind Gun to complete different environmental puzzles. The wind can push items inside it.

The first three levels are available and finished. Game is subject to change in the future. Looking to add:

  • Models/ Animations
  • More sound effects
  • Background Music
  • Accessibility Options
  • Voice Acting
  • Environmental Storytelling
Controls Keys:Actions:WASDMoveSpaceJumpLeft ClickShootScroll WheelChange size of windQGliderEscapePause Menu Videos:
